item.title: Joy - Touch By Touch
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: Andy Schweitzer, F. Jaklitsch
KY: 2420 / KY: 7157

Touch by touch
you’re my
all time lover
skin to skin
come on down
my cover-

When I feel the
time is right
and you’re
staying by my side
and the love
give to me
makes my heart beat
when my
fantasies fly away
but my
feeling makes me stay
I see the fire
in your eyes
It makes my
heart beat
Do it just do
do it night and day
you’re my
all time lover
Do it just do
do it in away
like there is
no other
touch by touch
you’re my
all time lover
skin to skin
Come on down my cover-

When my heart is full
of my love
it makes me
a trembling down
Love’s the games
that we play
now we make
When our love
is clear and bright
It’s our way
to see the light
There’s a fire
in our heart
night and day
Do it just do
do it night and day
you’re my
all time lover
do it just do
do it in away
like there is
no other
Touch by touch
you’re my
all time lover
skin to Skin
Come on down
my cover-

Do it just do
do it night and day
you’re my
all time lover
Do it just do
do it in away
like there is
no other
Touch by touch
you’re my
all time lover
skin to skin
Come on down my cover
Do it just do
do it night and day
you’re my
all time lover
Do it just do
do it in away
like there is
no other
Touch by touch
you’re my
all time lover
skin to skin
Come on down my cover-
